title: Ep 542 | Phil Plans His Funeral with a Skynyrd Song & What Is Temporal Love?
description:
Phil expresses his confidence in the resurrection of the dead by asking his sons to get some jives going at his funeral! Al remembers riding in the truck with his dad 40 years ago, when Phil asked him to play this Skynyrd song at his funeral. Jase details how to become courageous. And Jase wraps your head around the dwelling place of the omnipresent person of God while explaining the complications of temporal love.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
-
